file_content.text: [The artifacts are clearly missing and look to have been violently removed. There is a holo in the same area.]
I've only got a moment to rest. Those things from the Dark Temple are attacking again. Jez thinks they're drawn to the artifacts. I bet he's right.
They went berserk the second we packed everything up to leave.
It's time to make a stand. If those crazies want our relics, they'll have to kill us first!
